review:
I got what I paid for. Superb screen, extremely fast with everyday tasks. I am
using it for one month and loving it more and more.

Good

This phone is excellent. Speaker sound is loud. Touch quality is good. Display
brightness is enough in daylight condition. Battery backup very good for heavy
use.

Looks stylish  
I love it very much i think you may love it much as the phone design is like
that

My first received product is very worst and have some issues, replacement
product is good

Before starting with the review let me just inform you, i asked my friend to
lend this phone for couple of days for the review, this review is based on my
personal opinion and it can vary person to person, i hope you will enjoy this
review.  
\-----------------------------------------------------------------------  
LETS START THE REVIEW  
\---------------------------------------------------------  
LOOKS AND DESIGN _  
==================  
Now im one of them who appreciate good built quality and clean design, i
really like the ultimate clean design of this phone it looks and feels very
premium on the front side you get 8MP of front camera which is capable of
taking amazing pictures you can even record in HD from the front facing camera
it gets some amazing selfie features too, it doesn't not at all looks like
those of SAMSUNG similar design, you will actually enjoy watching videos on
the phone as the display it comes with is just brilliant in simple terms.  
\---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
UNIQUE FEATURES  
\-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
It is only the Smartphone which comes with internal 64GB of space at a price
tag of 13k it also comes with Dual camera setup which makes it again unique
because this Dual camera feature only comes in higher end smartphones. it also
comes with 4GB of RAM which is sufficient for any task you give it will take
everything with a smile, dual camera performs just great, battery comes pack
with 3340 mAh power which can serve you single all day with heavy usage and
one and a half day if used regularly at normal usage. ive also attached some
camera samples for your reference so that you get an idea what this Dual rear
camera capable of.  
\---------------------------------  
MY FINAL VERDICT  
\------------------------------------  
Now im sure you guys will feel as this is a PAID review, but let me tell you
ive used this just for the sake of reviewing it, i love technology and good
products makes me write reviews for them, so that people get to know about the
product, im amaze with the price it comes at that too 64GB as a internal is
just im loving it now, it is surely better than SAMSUNG and Mi device in the
same price range it actually offers you things that comes in high end
smartphones, and you guys will actually be amazed with the quality it comes
with this was my final verdict definitely get it if you are looking for a Dual
camera lens smartphone with amazing features and in a tight budget.If you have
any doubts or any questions related to this product mail me back ill surely
help you out with your queries.  
\----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
IF YOU GUYS LIKE THIS REVIEW, BELIEVE ME IT TAKES TOO MUCH OF TIME TO REVIEW A
PRODUCT IF YOU WANT TO THANK ME FOR BRINGING THIS REVIEW PLEASE PRESS "YES"
BELOW. THANK YOU  
  
PEACE... :)

not good ..
